title: XCOM.2.Anarchys.Children.DLC.READNFO-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ XCOM.2.Anarchys.Children.DLC-KaOs ]-
                                                                
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                          
                                                                
Release/Size:-------------[ 615MB ]-                            
                                                                
Release/Date:-------------[ 19-03-16 ]-                         
                                                                
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                         
                                                                
Iso/Crack:----------------[ CODEX ]-                            
                                                                
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Foreign Stuff ]-                    
                                                                
Movie/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-                        
                                                                
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-                        
                                                                
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Untouched ]-                        
                                                                
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ N/A ]-                              
                                                                
Final/Used/Space:---------[ N/A ]-                              
                                                                
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ None ]-                             



Step-1:-------[ Unrar Using Latest Winrar Or Equivilant ]-      
                                                                
Step-2:-------[ Click Install.exe                               
                Select Install Location And Wait For The        
                Game Data To Be Extracted/Rebuilt ]-            
                                                                
Step-3:-------[ Use The Created Desktop Or Startmenu            
                Shortcut To Play ]-                             
                                                                
                                                                
Estimated Install Time:- 15 Mins HDD To SSD         8 Cores [*] 
                                                    4 Cores [ ] 
                                                                
                                                                
                                                                
Release Notes:                                                  
                                                                
As Most Of You Have Probably Already Noticed The Codex Updates  
And DLC Will Not Correctly Install To Our Version Of The Game.  
This Little Release Is Your Solution.                           
                                                                
Required= XCOM.2.PROPER-KaOs                                    
                                                                
Includes= XCOM.2.Update.2-CODEX                                 
          XCOM.2.Anarchys.Children.DLC-CODEX                    
                                                                
This Patch Will Not Work On Other Versions Of The Game And      
Was Made Specificaly For Ours.                                  
                                                                
                                                                
                                                                
Install Notes:                                                  
                                                                
You Must Ensure You Are Installing To The Correct Folder.       
Using Both Base Game & Dlc Installer Default Locations          
Is Fine.                                                        
                                                                
Depending On The Release One Or More Command Windows May Open   
They Must Be Allowed To Finish And Should Not Be Closed Until   
Otherwise Prompted.                                             
                                                                
We Recommend Installing To A Short Path As Games With Deep      
Directory Structures Can Cause Missing Files.                   
                                                                
Do Not Install To A Path With Invalid Characters Or The Game    
Will Fail To Rebuild, Paths Like "Program Files (x86)"          
Contain Brackets What Will Cause Issues With Some Games.        
If In Doubt Use The Default Install Folder, The Game Can        
Then Be Moved To A Prefered Location When Install/Rebuild Is    
Complete
